snippet: Michael Schumacher’s 15-year-old son, Mick, will move from kart racing to Formula 4. Schumacher finished second in the world, European and German kart championships last season.
abstract: Mick Shumacher, 15-year-old son of Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, will advance from kart racing to Forumla 4.
lead_paragraph: Michael Schumacher’s 15-year-old son, Mick, will move from kart racing to Formula 4. Schumacher finished second in the world, European and German kart championships last season.
